content: love having cozy cabled socks peeking out of your boots knit these quick cuffs to get the look at a fraction of the cost they re versatile too-- wear them right side-out to look like tall socks or flip inside-out and fold over for a cuffed look helmikuu is the finnish word for february the perfect time for tall boots and tweedy yarns it means month of the pearl in reference to the pearl-like drops of ice that freeze on tree branches two versions of this pattern are available a no-nonsense edition for experienced knitters and a tutorial edition with tips on techniques and customization please note this pattern is designated for personal use only-- commercial use is prohibited knitting for yourself friends & family is fine but you may not sell finished items made from this pattern
